name: London
story: Welcome to London, head to Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park to face the slide at the ArcelorMittal Orbit to catch a glimpse of London's iconic skyline. In a moment, you will be heading for a tunnel filled with leaches!!!
nav: press 1 to go to France

name: France
story: You are in France, one of the world's iconic destinations for winter sports. Here is your ski kit, get practicing. You wouldn't want to be a sore loser!
nav: press 1 to go to Barcelona, press 2 to go to Gibraltar

name: Barcelona
story: Hi there, a glide has been reserved for you to see a football game at the Nou Camp. I hope you will be patriotic enough to support the national team.
nav: Press 1 to go to London, 2 to go to Marrakech

name: Gibraltar
story: Carefully Cross the long Windsor suspension bridge, this is not for the faint-hearted. Hopefully you are one the brave ones.
nav: Press 1 to go to Marrakech

name: Marrakech
story: You need to take a break from all your travels. Enjoy a plate of Tagine. It is very comforting.
nav: press 1 to go to Western Sahara, press 2 to go to Mauritania

name: Western Sahara
story: Navigate through the desert storm in the Sahara, be sure to look out for sand pits along the way.
nav: press 1 to go to Mauritania

name: Mauritania
story: Perfect time to be in Mauritania, the locals are having a sugar cane rum drinking contest. I hope you win!
nav: press 1 to go to Gambia, press 2 to go to Western Sahara, and press 3 to go to Senegal

name: Senegal
story: You have made a choice to spend your time at the only restaurant at la petite cï¿½te. Be sure not to have too much food.
nav: press 1 to go to Mauritania, press 2 to go to Chad, and press 3 to go to Barcelona

name: The Gambia
story: Navigate carefully in the slave ports, and find the ruined fortress of Kunta Kinte. It is said to be shaded by giant baobab trees.
nav: press 1 to go to Western Sahara, press 2 to go to Mali

name: Mali
story: Check out the UNESCO heritage site, you might be lucky to find some gold in the monumental houses.
nav: press 1 to go to Cote d'Ivoire

name: Cote d'Ivoire
story: Escape into the Basilica and remember to say a prayer. You will need it for the journey ahead.
nav: press 1 to go to Ghana

name: Ghana
story: I hear there is a special jeweller at the Kejetia market. Try your best to find him and buy some magical beads. It will aid your safety throughout your journey.
nav: press 1 to go to Togo

name: Togo
story: Sigh!!! Finally, you can visit some elephants but be wary of ivory poachers.
nav: press 1 to go to Benin

name: Benin
story: You will definitely have a rewarding time bird-watching at lake Nokoue and exploring its floating village.
nav: press 1 to go to Lagos, 2 to go to Chad

name: Lagos
story: Welcome to Lagos; I can feel your frustration being stuck in traffic on your way to the British high commission, but guess what? A crucial element is required for your adventure's success in one of the vehicles in this gridlock.
nav: press 1 to go to Egypt

name: Chad
story: Great to have you join in on the camel race, hold tight! it is going to be quite a ride.
nav: press 1 to go to Sudan

name: Sudan
story: Visit the ancient pyramids but beware of the desert heat, you might need to dig deep into the ground to reach some water, in other to stay alive.
nav: press 1 to go to Egypt, press 2 to go to Israel

name: Egypt
story: Take a hot balloon ride over the Luxor open-air museum, and make a drop into the museum, using your parachute.Hopefully you find it easy to locate the second map
nav: press 1 to go to Israel, press 2 to go to London

name: Israel
story: Welcome to the holy land! You are at the cathedral of St. James, make sure to take lots of pictures for your adventure journal.
nav: press 1 to go to Dubai

name: Dubai
story: At the very top of the Burj Khalifa, is the final piece of the map, make your way there, you have earned it.
nav: press 1 to go to Saudi Arabia, press 2 to go to Iraq

name: Saudi Arabia
story: For making it this far, you have been rewarded with a bag of gold sitting at the cradle of gold
nav: press 1 to go to Cote d'Ivoire, press 2 to go to Kuwait

name: Iraq
story: Keep an eye out for the black cat, defeating it a huge task, I wish you all the best
nav: Press 1 to go to France, press 2 to go to Jordan

name: Kuwait
story: You are on a ferry heading to the Failaka Island, visit the hidden spots on the island and do something fun.
nav: press 1 to go to Qatar

name: Jordan
story: It is unfortunate you have landed in the dead sea, you can't swim,  you die!

name: Qatar
story: The map led you to the Arabian Gulf,  you successfully locate the Macadeen shipwreck, and you find the treasure box, congratulation!!
